thread.title: Marketing To Your Niche Key Message at Agent@Home Travel Summit Panels
thread.title_full: Marketing To Your Niche Key Message at Agent@Home Travel Summit Panels

title: Marketing To Your Niche Key Message at Agent@Home Travel Summit Panels
text:
Last updated: 11:30 AM ET, Fri September 18 2015 Marketing To Your Niche Key Message at Agent@Home Travel Summit Panels Travel Agent | Avanti Destinations | Ryan Rudnansky | September 18, 2015 
PHOTO: The “Market Your Niche” panel focused on the benefits of specialization. (photo by Janeen Christoff) 
In the second day of the Agent@Home Travel Summit, agents learned about the importance of specialization, ways to boost commissions and best practices for home-based travel businesses
